r.s: A Web GUI frontend for the PEAR_PackageFileManager2 class.
r.d: This package is a web frontend for the PEAR_PackageFileManager2 class. It makes it easier for developers to create and maintain PEAR package.xml files (versions 1.0 and 2.0).
r.n:
* news - use new configuration structure and management of PEAR_PackageFileManager_Frontend 0.4.0 - two news examples - all PFM replaces task options can now be apply (api-version, ...)
* improvements - PEAR::PHP_Compat package begin optional dependency (only required for PHP4)
